INIT,Open,RES_Ok,OK,NoOldInput
NoOldInput,ProcesNewInput,RES_OutFullInEmpty,OutFullInEmpty,NoOldInput
NoOldInput,ProcesNewInput,RES_OutNowFull,OutNowFull,OldInput
NoOldInput,ProcesNewInput,RES_InNowEmpty,InNowEmpty,NoOldInput
NoOldInput,ProcesNewInput,RES_InternalError,InternalError,FINAL
NoOldInput,Close,RES_Ok_done,OK_done,FINAL
NoOldInput,Close,RES_Ok_more,OK_moreOutputremains,Rundown
NoOldInput,Close,RES_InternalError,InternalError,FINAL
NoOldInput,Error,RES_Ok,nooutput,FINAL
OldInput,ProcesOldData,RES_OutFullInEmpty,OutFullInEmpty,NoOldInput
OldInput,ProcesOldData,RES_OutNowFull,OutNowFull,OldInput
OldInput,ProcesOldData,RES_InNowEmpty,InNowEmpty,NoOldInput
OldInput,ProcesOldData,RES_InternalError,InternalError,FINAL
OldInput,Error,RES_Ok,nooutput,FINAL
Rundown,Close,RES_Ok_done,nooutput,FINAL
Rundown,Close,RES_Ok_more,OK_moreOutputremains,Rundown
Rundown,Error,RES_Ok,nooutput,FINAL
